page.title: 11LIBRARY & READERS,WATERLANE.
page.content: There are{two librarians}in the mobile library.One does all the {driving while the other issues the {books and answers enquiries.}When they are not operating in the mobile library they work in the Cirencester one.They both like working on the mobile library it gives them a chance to get to know the people better than in{Cirencester Library. In a period of 25 minutes{6 people who visited the library were interviewed.All except one borrower lived within walking distance.There were both young and elderly adults and 2 mothers borrowed books for their children.Of the 6 people interviewed 5 were{women}and they liked{novels and {romances}the best.They all think the library is a good idea as it saves a journey into town.If the service stopped they would use{Stroud Library
